ruleContent.content:
<js>
var doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

function decode(str){
var s=String(str).replace(/\\/g,"%")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[\s\S]*?\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]\(\'/,"")
.replace(/\'\)[\s\S]*/,"")
.replace(/%%%%[A-Z]\._/g,"\\\\u")
.replace(/%%/g,"\\");
s=eval('"'+s+'"');
return eval('"'+s+'"');
}

var js=doc.selectFirst('script:containsData(getDecode)').data();


doc.selectFirst('#content [id]').html(decode(js));
doc.getElementById('content').outerHtml()
</js>
